extDesc.message: Provides keyboard access to landmark regions and headings (h1â€“h6) on a web page.

landmarksLabel.description: menu group label for landmarks section

headingsLabel.description: menu group label for headings section

headingLevel.description: aria-label attribute value for heading menu item with added heading level info

emptyContent.description: menu item message that indicates the heading text content is empty

noLandmarksMsg.description: menu group message indicating that no 'main', 'search' or 'navigation' landmarks were found

noHeadingsMsg.description: menu group message indicating that no headings matching the selected options were found

maxLevelLabel.description: options form label for 'heading level' radio buttons fieldset

mainOnlyLabel.message: Only show headings found in main landmark
mainOnlyLabel.description: options form label for 'main only' checkbox

showLevelsLabel.description: options form label for 'show levels' checkbox
